fragrances.title: The
fragrances.description: Discover the intricate layers of our fragrances, carefully composed to create a harmonious sensory experience.

topNotes.title: TOP NOTES
topNotes.subtitle: First Impression
topNotes.description: The initial impression of our fragrance opens with vibrant citrus, bergamot, and crisp apple, creating an invigorating and refreshing introduction.

middleNotes.title: MIDDLE NOTES
middleNotes.subtitle: Heart of the Fragrance
middleNotes.description: The heart reveals a sophisticated blend of jasmine, rose, and violet, intertwined with subtle spicy accords of cinnamon and cardamom.

baseNotes.title: BASE NOTES
baseNotes.subtitle: Lasting Impression
baseNotes.description: The lingering foundation consists of warm amber, rich vanilla, and exotic sandalwood, providing depth and longevity to the olfactory experience.

categories.title: Curated
categories.description: Explore our distinct fragrance families, each crafted to evoke specific moods and experiences.

contact.title: Stay

olfactoryJourney.title: The Olfactory Journey
olfactoryJourney.description: Discover the intricate layers of our fragrances, carefully composed to create a harmonious sensory experience.
olfactoryJourney.topNotesDescription: The initial impression of our fragrance opens with vibrant citrus, bergamot, and crisp apple, creating an invigorating and refreshing introduction.

olfactoryJourney.baseNotesDescription: The lingering foundation consists of warm amber, rich vanilla, and exotic sandalwood, providing depth and longevity to the olfactory experience.

perfume.title: Midnight Elixir
perfume.subtitle: A captivating blend of mystery and elegance

overview.title: The Essence of Luxury
overview.paragraph1: Midnight Elixir is a sophisticated fragrance that embodies the essence of luxury and mystery. Created by master perfumer Claire Dubois, this exquisite scent captures the allure of a moonlit garden with notes of rare black orchid, amber, and sandalwood.
overview.paragraph2: Each bottle is meticulously crafted from the finest materials, featuring a hand-polished obsidian cap and gold-etched glass. The result is not just a fragrance, but a work of art that elevates any collection.

notes.title: Fragrance Notes
notes.description: Experience the evolution of Midnight Elixir as it unfolds on your skin, revealing a complex harmony of rare and precious ingredients carefully selected to create a signature scent.
notes.chartDescription: The radar chart illustrates the intensity and presence of key notes in Midnight Elixir, showing how different elements come together to create the fragrance's unique profile.

timeline.openingDesc: The fragrance opens with vibrant citrus and spicy notes. Bergamot, black pepper, and cardamom create an energetic and refreshing first impression.
timeline.heartDesc: As the opening notes settle, the heart of the fragrance reveals itself with luxurious floral elements. Black orchid, jasmine, and iris blend together in perfect harmony.
timeline.baseDesc: In the final phase, the warm base notes of amber, sandalwood, and vanilla emerge to create a long-lasting, elegant drydown that lingers on the skin.

ingredients.title: Ingredients
ingredients.description: Our fragrances combine the finest natural ingredients with innovative synthetic molecules to create a balanced and long-lasting scent profile.

sustainability.title: Sustainable Sourcing
sustainability.description: We maintain direct relationships with growers to ensure fair trade practices and environmental responsibility in our supply chain.

ethical.title: Ethical Practices
ethical.description: Our formulations are 100% cruelty-free and we use eco-friendly processes to minimize our environmental footprint.

disclaimer.title: Product Information
disclaimer.text: Ingredients are subject to change at the manufacturer's discretion. For the most complete and up-to-date list of ingredients, please refer to the product packaging.

reviews.title: Customer Reviews
reviews.description: Read what our customers have to say about their experience with Midnight Elixir.

comments.johnReview: This fragrance is absolutely extraordinary. It has the perfect balance of mystery and sophistication. The longevity is impressive - I can still detect it on my skin at the end of the day.
comments.sophiaReview: Midnight Elixir has become my signature scent. I receive compliments every time I wear it. The black orchid note is particularly enchanting.
comments.michaelReview: A very luxurious fragrance with excellent sillage. My only critique is that I wish it projected a bit more in the final hours, but the scent itself is magnificent.
comments.emmaReview: Worth every penny. The bottle design is as exquisite as the fragrance itself. It evolves beautifully throughout the day, revealing different facets as time passes.
